title: IIAP Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for Laboratory Technical Assistant Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Astrophysics (IIAP) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Laboratory Technical Assistant Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their ITI, Diploma in Electrical Engineering can apply for the IIAP Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, ...
